name: LuftRanger
description:
Take to the skies in an alternate history spin and attempt to tame the west while riding your mechanical horse!

Luftrangers is a 2.5D game where you take on the role of the “Ranger”. Being sent out ahead of the Union Pacific who are building the transcontinental railroad. You are tasked with keeping the projected track route clear of bandit gangs who are trying to keep the west untamed.

Customize your mechanical horse with variety of options!
 - Wing types affect your turning and control.
 - Horse variations affect your health and top speed.
 - Various weapons to choose from to take down your foes and defend the skies and  ground.

Tab - Transform between ground and aim modes.
A/D - Turn your horse left and right.
Left mouse - Fire.

  • Project manager - Peter Southard (Lankor)
  • Vision holder - Joshua Bennett (JoshB47)
  • Code maintainer -  Bradley Seymour (@bradleyseemore)
  • Code maintainer - Yoshikazu Nakamura (Yoshikazu Nakamura)
